backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a dashboard interaction requirement to one frontend file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading SheetJS and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling data upload, department/semester filtering, analytics computation, and view switching.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleBar: SVG bar chart with dynamic width, scroll support, and truncated labels.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleLin: SVG line chart with grid lines, labeled points, and responsive scaling.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimplePie: SVG pie chart generating slice arcs with a legend and percentage labels.
frontend/src/features/comparison/Semeste: Displays multi-semester performance comparison with trend charts and a detailed metrics table, falling back to a message if fewer than two semesters exist.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/BacklogD: Shows backlog groups with collapsible lists of affected students and allows selecting individual roll numbers.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Semester: Main semester dashboard combining charts, subject analysis, student lookup, backlog distribution, and student data sheet navigation.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/StudentD: Renders a detailed student record view including personal info, subject-wise marks, and overall status with a close action.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/StudentR: Provides a search interface for finding students by roll number with department-aware result handling.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/SubjectA: Lists subjects sorted by backlog count and allows viewing failed students per subject.
frontend/src/features/upload/UploadScree: React component providing drag-and-drop or file-select Excel upload, invoking parseExcelFile and reporting processing state or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using React Query with automatic recreation and query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities, handling login/logout, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks; exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, setting global colors and layout tokens.
frontend/src/lib/analytics/backlogDistri: Computes groups of students by number of backlogs, returning sorted backlog counts with roll-number lists.
frontend/src/lib/analytics/computeSemest: Generates per-semester statistics including pass/fail counts, percentages, backlog metrics, and subject-wise backlog tallies.
frontend/src/lib/analytics/subjectFailur: Builds a map of subjects to sorted lists of students who failed them based on backlogSubjects.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseExcelFile.ts: Parses Excel files into structured ParsedData, detecting long vs wide formats and validating required fields.
frontend/src/lib/format/numberFormat.ts: Utility functions formatting numbers, percentages, and decimals with safety checks.
frontend/src/lib/format/subjectAbbreviat: Generates subject name abbreviations and formats subject codes with derived abbreviations.
frontend/src/lib/guards/assertions.ts: Provides assertion helpers for defined values, non-empty arrays, and valid numeric checks.
frontend/src/lib/state/appFlowTypes.ts: Defines types for student records, parsed dataset structure, and semester-level analytics.
frontend/src/lib/students/lookupStudentR: Provides a case-insensitive lookup function that returns all students whose roll number matches the given input.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for the Academic Result Analytics project.
